overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a diverse and engaging social media presence across multiple platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky. With a total of 3580 followers, his content primarily focuses on research in social media analysis, disinformation, and computational methods, attracting significant engagement through likes, reposts, and comments.

contentThemes.description: Posts announcing new research papers, grants, and findings in the field of social media analysis and disinformation.
Posts related to job openings and opportunities for collaboration in computational social science.
Discussions and announcements related to studying and detecting coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media.

recommendations: Increase frequency of posts related to recent achievements and ongoing research projects to sustain and boost engagement.
Engage with followers by responding to comments and encouraging discussions to enhance interaction and visibility.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon posts receive moderate engagement; increasing interaction with followers could boost visibility.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn shows the highest engagement, especially with posts related to research achievements and career opportunities.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
